metadata.titleEn: Multi-scale surface flux and meteorological elements observation dataset in the Hai River Basin (Huailai station-lysimeters, 2017)
metadata.titleCn: 海河流域多尺度地表通量与气象要素观测数据集：怀来站-蒸渗仪-2017
metadata.description:
The data set contains the observation data of the evapotranspiration apparatus on January 1, 2017 (solstice) and December 31, 2017.The site is located in huailai county, hebei province, east garden town, the underlying surface for corn.The latitude and longitude of the observation point is 115.7880E, 40.3491N, and the altitude is 480m.
The collection frequency of the evapotranspiration permeameter is 1 time/min, and the released data is 10min output data.The evapotranspiration meter is a cylindrical structure with a surface area of 1m2 and a buried depth of 1.5m. The observation accuracy of evapotranspiration is 0.01mm.Two evapotranspiration seeptometers were installed, one kept bare soil (lysimeter_1), the other for the corn underlay (lysimeter_2) during the growing season (May 10 - September 15).Soil temperature and humidity probe, soil water potential probe and soil heat flow plate are also installed in the evapotranspiration apparatus.The buried depth of the soil temperature sensor is 5cm, 30cm, 50cm, 100cm and 140cm.The buried depth of the soil water sensor is 2cm, 10cm, 20cm and 40cm.The soil heat flux plate is buried 10cm underground;The buried depth of the soil water potential sensor was 30cm and 140cm.Processing and quality control of observation data :(1) ensure 144 data per day (every 10min). If data is missing, it will be marked by -6999;(2) delete the data of observation anomalies caused during maintenance;(3) data that is obviously beyond the physical meaning or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the format of date and time is unified, and the date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: 2016-6-10-10:30.
The observation data released by the evapotranspiration permeameter include:Date/Time, weighing mass (i.l._1_wag_l_000 (Kg), i.l._2_wag_l_000 (Kg)), seepage mass (i.l._1_wag_d_000 (Kg), i.l._2_wag_d_000 (Kg)), soil heat flux (Gs_1_10cm, Gs_2_10cm) (W/m2),Multi-layer soil moisture (Ms_1_5cm, Ms_1_10cm, Ms_1_30cm, Ms_1_50cm, Ms_1_50cm, Ms_1_100cm, Ms_2_5cm, Ms_2_10cm, Ms_2_30cm, Ms_2_50cm, Ms_2_100cm) (%),Multi-layer soil temperature (Ts_1_5cm, Ts_1_30cm, Ts_1_50cm, Ts_1_100cm, Ts_1_140cm, Ts_2_140cm, ts_2_2_5cm, ts_2_2_50cm, Ts_2_100cm, Ts_2_140cm) (℃), soil water potential (TS_1_30 (hPa), TS_1_140 (hPa), TS_2_30 (hPa), TS_2_30 (hPa), TS_2_140 (hPa), TS_2_140 (hPa));The data is stored in *.xls format.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2017年1月1日至2017年12月31日的蒸渗仪观测数据。站点位于河北省怀来县东花园镇，下垫面为玉米。观测点的经纬度是115.7880E，40.3491N，海拔480m。
蒸渗仪的采集频率是1次/分钟，发布数据为10min输出数据。蒸渗仪为圆柱形结构，表面积为1m2，土柱埋深1.5m，蒸散量观测精度为0.01mm。蒸渗仪安装有两台，一台保持裸土（lysimeter_1），另一台在生长季（5月10日-9月15日）为玉米下垫面（lysimeter_2）。蒸渗仪内还安装有土壤温湿度探头、土壤水势探头和土壤热流板。土壤温度传感器埋设深度为5cm、30cm、50cm、100cm、140cm；土壤水分传感器埋设深度为2cm、10cm、20cm、40cm；土壤热流板埋设在地下10cm处；土壤水势传感器埋设深度为30cm和140cm处。观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）删除了维护期间造成的观测异常的数据；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2016-6-10 10:30。
蒸渗仪发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，称重质量（I.L_1_WAG_L_000（Kg）、I.L_2_WAG_L_000（Kg）），渗漏质量（I.L_1_WAG_D_000（Kg）、I.L_2_WAG_D_000（Kg）），土壤热通量（Gs_1_10cm、Gs_2_10cm）（W/m2），多层土壤水分（Ms_1_5cm、Ms_1_10cm、Ms_1_30cm、Ms_1_50cm、Ms_1_100cm、Ms_2_5cm、Ms_2_10cm、Ms_2_30cm、Ms_2_50cm、Ms_2_100cm）（%），多层土壤温度（Ts_1_5cm、Ts_1_30cm、Ts_1_50cm、Ts_1_100cm、Ts_1_140cm、Ts_2_5cm、Ts_2_30cm、Ts_2_50cm、Ts_2_100cm、Ts_2_140cm）（℃），土壤水势（TS_1_30（hPa）、TS_1_140（hPa）、TS_2_30（hPa）、TS_2_140（hPa））；数据以*.xls格式存储。

background: Based on the measurements of lysimeter, eddy covariance (EC), and automatic weather station (AWS) in Huailai Remote Sensing Experiment Station in 2012 and 2013, the daily and seasonal variation of soil evaporation and maize field evapotranspiration have been analyzed. The relationship between field evapotranspiration and meteorological factors (net radiation, air temperature, air humidity, and wind speed), soil moisture has been studied through multiple regression analysis method. Lysimeter’s representativeness was significantly affected by the growth of the crops within it. As heat can not be exchanged between the soil in lysimeter and the soil outside, the average temperature of the soil in the lysimeter is 9.5% higher than that of the field outside.
research objective: 本文利用2012年和2013年5-9月河北怀来中国科学院遥感综合试验站蒸渗仪观测资料，计算了玉米生长季的土壤蒸发、作物蒸散、降雨、渗漏量，结合气象因子探讨土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的日、季节变化规律，并比较分析涡动相关仪与蒸渗仪蒸散量的观测结果，验证蒸渗仪的代表性，初步分析两者差异产生的原因，为今后开展农田灌溉决策、农业节水等研究提供参考。
challenges: 蒸渗仪为单点观测，观测范围较小，其空间代表性有限，因此验证蒸渗仪的观测结果能否代表区域范围内农田的蒸散值十分有必要。即使进行能量闭合订正后，涡动相关仪观测的蒸散量较蒸渗仪偏低，蒸渗仪观测结果表现出高估的现象。强小嫚等认为蒸渗仪隔断了与周围农田的水热交换，导致的蒸渗仪内土壤水分供应与热交换与周围农田的不同，由此可能造成蒸渗仪对蒸散量的高估。
methods: 为研究华北区域农田蒸散发的变化特征，在研究区布设了一套多尺度蒸散发观测系统。实验区以图中红线为界，分为水浇地和旱地，水浇地和旱地分别架设了10 m气象塔和40 m气象塔，都安装了自动气象站和涡动相关仪，蒸渗仪和波文比能量平衡系统安装在位于水浇地的10 m气象塔处。根据试验需求，两台蒸渗仪中的一台保持裸土，作为对比另一台则种植玉米。为了保证在试验期间蒸渗仪内玉米和周围农田玉米生长条件一致，2012年5月5日和2013年5月10日，在其中一台蒸渗仪上种植了玉米，品种为郑单958，播种时间、行距和株距同周围农田一致，并且定期对蒸渗仪内土地进行除草，尽量保证蒸渗仪内玉米生长同周围农田一致。
dataset: 本研究所用的蒸渗仪为德国UMS公司生产的称重式蒸渗仪，型号为Hydro-Lysimeter。2011年9月11日安装于试验站外东侧约300 m处农田内，距农田外道路约10 m。蒸渗仪为圆柱状结构，表面积为1 m²，柱体高度为1.5 m，蒸散测量精度为0.1 mm。两台蒸渗仪共用一个维护井，维护井内安装了两个渗漏桶，用于蒸渗仪的渗漏量测量，测量精度为0.01 mm。此外，两台蒸渗仪内均安装有土壤水势、土壤温度、土壤湿度、土壤热通量传感器。
findings: The result shows that the daily variation curves of soil evaporation were quite consistent with maize field evapotranspiration, while seasonal differences were obvious. In the region of Huailai, net radiation and soil moisture obviously correlated with daily evapotranspiration, while other factors did not obviously correlate. The correlativity between evapotranspiration measured by EC and that by lysimeter is very good. The value of lysimeter is 10.5% higher than that of EC. As a result, the evapotranspiration of lysimeter is relatively larger.
backgroundCn: 根据2012年和2013年在怀来遥感实验站的蒸渗仪、涡度协方差（EC）和自动气象站（AWS）的测量数据，分析了土壤蒸发和玉米田蒸散的日变化和季节变化。通过多元回归分析方法研究了田间蒸散与气象因素（净辐射、气温、空气湿度和风速）、土壤湿度之间的关系。蒸渗仪的代表性受到其内作物生长的显著影响。由于蒸渗仪内的土壤与外部土壤之间无法进行热量交换，蒸渗仪内土壤的平均温度比外部田地的温度高出9.5%。
research objectiveCn: The text is already in Chinese.
challengesCn: 蒸渗仪为单点观测，观测范围较小，其空间代表性有限，因此验证蒸渗仪的观测结果能否代表区域范围内农田的蒸散值十分有必要。即使进行能量闭合订正后，涡动相关仪观测的蒸散量较蒸渗仪偏低，蒸渗仪观测结果表现出高估的现象。强小嫚等认为蒸渗仪隔断了与周围农田的水热交换，导致的蒸渗仪内土壤水分供应与热交换与周围农田的不同，由此可能造成蒸渗仪对蒸散量的高估。
methodsCn: 为研究华北区域农田蒸散发的变化特征，在研究区布设了一套多尺度蒸散发观测系统。实验区以图中红线为界，分为水浇地和旱地，水浇地和旱地分别架设了10 m气象塔和40 m气象塔，都安装了自动气象站和涡动相关仪，蒸渗仪和波文比能量平衡系统安装在位于水浇地的10 m气象塔处。根据试验需求，两台蒸渗仪中的一台保持裸土，作为对比另一台则种植玉米。为了保证在试验期间蒸渗仪内玉米和周围农田玉米生长条件一致，2012年5月5日和2013年5月10日，在其中一台蒸渗仪上种植了玉米，品种为郑单958，播种时间、行距和株距同周围农田一致，并且定期对蒸渗仪内土地进行除草，尽量保证蒸渗仪内玉米生长同周围农田一致。
datasetCn: 本研究所用的蒸渗仪为德国UMS公司生产的称重式蒸渗仪，型号为Hydro-Lysimeter。2011年9月11日安装于试验站外东侧约300米处的农田内，距农田外道路约10米。蒸渗仪为圆柱状结构，表面积为1平方米，柱体高度为1.5米，蒸散测量精度为0.1毫米。两台蒸渗仪共用一个维护井，维护井内安装了两个渗漏桶，用于蒸渗仪的渗漏量测量，测量精度为0.01毫米。此外，两台蒸渗仪内均安装有土壤水势、土壤温度、土壤湿度、土壤热通量传感器。
findingsCn: 结果显示，土壤蒸发的日变化曲线与玉米田的蒸散发非常一致，而季节差异则明显。在怀来地区，净辐射和土壤湿度与日蒸散发明显相关，而其他因素则没有明显相关性。通过EC测量的蒸散发与通过蒸渗仪测量的蒸散发之间的相关性非常好。蒸渗仪的值比EC高出10.5%。因此，蒸渗仪的蒸散发相对较大。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the installation of lysimeters in maize fields allow for accurate measurement of evapotranspiration despite their limited spatial representativeness?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在玉米田安装蒸渗仪是否能够准确测量蒸散发，尽管它们的空间代表性有限？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the challenges in data collection for soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration primarily due to spatial representativeness, measurement precision, or environmental factors?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的数据显示收集挑战主要是由于空间代表性、测量精度还是环境因素？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the main source of soil temperature and moisture data from lysimeters, soil probes, or meteorological towers?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 土壤温度和湿度数据的主要来源是蒸发皿、土壤探头还是气象塔？

Concept Completion.QuestionCn: Huailai站的蒸散发测量在土壤水分测定仪数据集中数据收集的频率是多少？

Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于蒸发皿数据收集的实验地点位于哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Huailai County, Donghuayuan Town, Hebei Province
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 怀来县，东花园镇，河北省

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What types of sensors are installed within the lysimeter for data collection?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在蒸渗仪中安装了哪些类型的传感器用于数据收集？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: soil temperature probes, soil moisture sensors, soil water potential sensors, soil heat flux plates
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 土壤温度探测器、土壤湿度传感器、土壤水势传感器、土壤热通量板

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that ensures the accuracy and reliability of soil moisture and temperature measurements in agricultural research?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，以确保农业研究中土壤湿度和温度测量的准确性和可靠性？
Example.AnswerEn: A data collection method that ensures accuracy and reliability in agricultural research involves using a lysimeter with soil moisture and temperature sensors installed at multiple depths. The sensors provide data that include soil moisture content at depths of 2cm, 10cm, 20cm, and 40cm, and soil temperature at depths of 5cm, 30cm, 50cm, 100cm, and 140cm. This helps in understanding soil moisture and temperature dynamics crucial for agricultural research.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种确保农业研究中准确性和可靠性的资料收集方法是使用配备土壤湿度和温度传感器的蒸发皿，这些传感器安装在多个深度。传感器提供的数据包括在2厘米、10厘米、20厘米和40厘米深度的土壤湿度含量，以及在5厘米、30厘米、50厘米、100厘米和140厘米深度的土壤温度。这有助于理解土壤湿度和温度动态，这对农业研究至关重要。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when using lysimeters to measure evapotranspiration in agricultural fields?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用 lysimeters 测量农业田间蒸散发时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge faced when using lysimeters to measure evapotranspiration in agricultural fields is their limited spatial representativeness. Since lysimeters are single-point observation instruments, they might not accurately represent the evapotranspiration values over a larger field area. Additionally, the isolation of the lysimeter from the surrounding soil can lead to differences in heat and moisture exchange, potentially causing an overestimation of evapotranspiration measurements.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用蒸渗仪测量农业田间的蒸散发时面临的一个挑战是其空间代表性有限。由于蒸渗仪是单点观测仪器，可能无法准确代表更大区域的蒸散发值。此外，蒸渗仪与周围土壤的隔离可能导致热量和水分交换的差异，从而可能导致蒸散发测量值的高估。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the lysimeter used for data collection in terms of its structure and measurement precision?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于数据收集的蒸渗仪在结构和测量精度方面有哪些特点？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: cylindrical structure, surface area of 1 m², soil column depth of 1.5 m, measurement precision of 0.01 mm for evapotranspiration, measurement precision of 0.1 mm for seepage
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 圆柱形结构，表面积为1平方米，土柱深度为1.5米，蒸散精度为0.01毫米，渗漏精度为0.1毫米。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with the spatial representativeness of lysimeter observations in agricultural research?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 农业研究中，土壤水分观测器（lysimeter）观察的空间代表性面临哪些挑战？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: single-point observations, limited spatial representativeness, overestimation of evapotranspiration
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 单点观测，空间代表性有限，蒸散量高估

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What features are included in the meteorological and soil data collected alongside lysimeter measurements?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与蒸渗仪测量一起收集的气象和土壤数据包括哪些特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: soil heat flux, multi-layer soil moisture, multi-layer soil temperature, soil water potential, soil temperature sensors at 5 cm to 140 cm, soil moisture sensors at 2 cm to 40 cm, soil heat flux plates at 10 cm depth, soil water potential sensors at 30 cm and 140 cm depths
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 土壤热通量，多层土壤湿度，多层土壤温度，土壤水势，5厘米到140厘米的土壤温度传感器，2厘米到40厘米的土壤湿度传感器，10厘米深度的土壤热通量板，30厘米和140厘米深度的土壤水势传感器。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the sampling frequency used for data collection in a lysimeter setup within this field?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在该领域的蒸渗仪设置中，数据收集使用的采样频率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many sensors are typically installed within a lysimeter to measure soil temperature at different depths?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 通常在蒸发皿中安装多少个传感器以测量不同深度的土壤温度？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the measurement precision of evapotranspiration in a lysimeter used for this field?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于该领域的蒸散发测量在土壤水分计中具有怎样的精度？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does a 'lysimeter' mean in the context of soil and crop evapotranspiration studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在土壤和作物蒸散研究中，“蒸渗仪”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: A lysimeter is an instrument used for measuring the amount of water that is lost from the soil due to evaporation and plant transpiration. It is typically a cylindrical structure with a known surface area and depth, such as 1m² surface area and 1.5m depth, used to study soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration by isolating a section of soil and its vegetation. The lysimeter allows for precise measurement of water input and output, providing data on evapotranspiration and other related factors.
Definition.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪是一种用于测量土壤因蒸发和植物蒸腾而损失的水量的仪器。它通常是一个具有已知表面积和深度的圆柱形结构，例如1平方米的表面积和1.5米的深度，用于通过隔离一部分土壤及其植被来研究土壤蒸发和作物蒸散。蒸渗仪允许精确测量水的输入和输出，提供关于蒸散和其他相关因素的数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with using lysimeters for measuring evapotranspiration in agricultural fields?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用 lysimeter 测量农业田间蒸散发的挑战有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: The challenges associated with using lysimeters for measuring evapotranspiration include their limited spatial representativeness due to being single-point observations. Additionally, they can overestimate evapotranspiration because they isolate soil and vegetation from surrounding fields, interrupting natural water and heat exchange processes. This isolation can result in differences in soil moisture supply and heat exchange compared to the surrounding area.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用 lysimeter 测量蒸散发所面临的挑战包括其空间代表性有限，因为它们是单点观测。此外，由于它们将土壤和植被与周围田地隔离，打断了自然的水分和热量交换过程，因此可能会高估蒸散发。这种隔离可能导致与周围区域相比，土壤水分供应和热量交换的差异。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using multiple regression analysis in studying the relationship between field evapotranspiration and meteorological factors?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在研究田间蒸散发与气象因素之间关系时，使用多元回归分析的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Multiple regression analysis is significant in studying the relationship between field evapotranspiration and meteorological factors because it allows researchers to quantitatively analyze how various factors such as net radiation, air temperature, air humidity, wind speed, and soil moisture contribute to evapotranspiration. This analytical method helps in understanding the complex interactions and determining the most influential factors affecting evapotranspiration in a given region or under specific conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 多元回归分析在研究田间蒸散与气象因素之间的关系中具有重要意义，因为它允许研究人员定量分析净辐射、空气温度、空气湿度、风速和土壤湿度等各种因素如何影响蒸散。这种分析方法有助于理解复杂的相互作用，并确定在特定区域或特定条件下影响蒸散的最重要因素。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the data collection technique using a lysimeter compare to that using an eddy covariance system in terms of measuring field evapotranspiration?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用 lysimeter 的数据收集技术与使用涡度协方差系统在测量田间蒸散发方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Data collection using a lysimeter involves direct measurement of evapotranspiration by weighing changes in soil mass, which provides high precision but may have limited spatial representativeness due to the isolation of the soil column. In contrast, the eddy covariance system measures fluxes over larger areas, providing broader spatial coverage but may underestimate evapotranspiration compared to lysimeters, as indicated by a 10.5% higher measurement from the lysimeter.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用蒸渗仪进行数据收集涉及通过称量土壤质量的变化直接测量蒸散发，这提供了高精度，但由于土壤柱的孤立性，可能在空间代表性上有限。相比之下，涡度协方差系统在更大区域内测量通量，提供更广泛的空间覆盖，但可能低估蒸散发，与蒸渗仪相比，蒸渗仪的测量结果高出10.5%。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in spatial representativeness between data collected by lysimeters and automatic weather stations in agricultural fields?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在农业领域中，利用土壤水分计和自动气象站收集的数据在空间代表性方面有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Lysimeters provide point measurements and have limited spatial representativeness, as they isolate a small volume of soil and may not account for heterogeneities in the surrounding area. Automatic weather stations, on the other hand, collect data over a broader area, capturing more spatial variability in meteorological conditions but may not capture detailed soil processes as lysimeters do.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪提供点位测量，空间代表性有限，因为它们隔离了小体积的土壤，可能无法考虑周围区域的异质性。自动气象站则在更广泛的区域内收集数据，捕捉气象条件的更多空间变异性，但可能无法像蒸渗仪那样详细捕捉土壤过程。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the separation of heat and water exchange between the lysimeter and surrounding soil affect the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 热量和水分在 lysimeter 与周围土壤之间的分离可能如何影响蒸散发测量的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The separation of heat and water exchange can lead to the lysimeter displaying higher soil temperature and potentially higher evapotranspiration rates compared to the surrounding soil, which might result in an overestimation of the evapotranspiration values.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 热量和水分交换的分离可能导致土壤温度在 lysimeter 中显示更高，并且潜在的蒸散发率也可能高于周围土壤，这可能导致蒸散发值的高估。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could the installation of sensors at various soil depths contribute to understanding soil moisture and temperature dynamics in agricultural fields?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在不同土壤深度安装传感器可以通过哪些方式帮助理解农田中的土壤湿度和温度动态变化？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Installing sensors at various depths allows for detailed monitoring of soil moisture and temperature profiles, helping to reveal how these factors vary throughout the soil column and affect plant growth and water usage over time.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在不同深度安装传感器可以详细监测土壤湿度和温度剖面，帮助揭示这些因素在土壤柱中的变化以及它们如何随着时间的推移影响植物生长和水分使用。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What potential challenges can arise from using a single-point observation system like a lysimeter for representing regional agricultural evapotranspiration values?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用单点观测系统如蒸发蒸散仪来代表区域农业蒸发蒸散值可能会出现哪些潜在挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: A single-point observation system like a lysimeter may have limited spatial representativeness, making it necessary to verify if its measurements can accurately reflect the broader area's evapotranspiration values, especially considering environmental variations such as crop growth and microclimate differences.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 单点观测系统如蒸渗仪可能具有有限的空间代表性，因此有必要验证其测量值是否能够准确反映更大区域的蒸散发值，特别是考虑到作物生长和微气候差异等环境变化。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the lysimeter to overestimate evapotranspiration compared to other measurement methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 什么原因导致 lysimeter 对蒸散发的估计高于其他测量方法？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The lysimeter's isolation from surrounding soil prevents heat exchange, resulting in a higher soil temperature and potentially leading to an overestimation of evapotranspiration.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: lysimeter与周围土壤的隔离阻止了热量交换，导致土壤温度升高，可能导致蒸散发的高估。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the limited spatial representativeness of single-point lysimeter measurements?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 单点土壤水分测量的空间代表性有限的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The confined nature of lysimeters and their inability to account for spatial variability in soil and crop conditions limit their representativeness for broader field evapotranspiration measurements.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: lysimeter的封闭特性以及它们无法考虑土壤和作物条件的空间变异性，限制了它们在更广泛的田间蒸散量测量中的代表性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to ensure consistent growth conditions in and around the lysimeter for accurate data collection?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么确保 lysimeter 内外的一致生长条件对于准确数据收集是必要的？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: To ensure that the lysimeter's measurements reflect true field conditions, consistent growth conditions are necessary to align the microenvironment within the lysimeter with the surrounding fields, thus minimizing discrepancies in water and heat exchange.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 为了确保土壤水分测定仪的测量反映真实的田间条件，需要保持一致的生长条件，以使土壤水分测定仪内的微环境与周围田地相一致，从而最小化水分和热量交换的差异。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using lysimeter measurements for evaluating evapotranspiration over a larger agricultural region?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用 lysimeter 测量评估更大农业区域的蒸散发可能带来的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Lysimeter measurements have limited spatial representativeness due to their single-point nature. This can lead to discrepancies when extrapolating data to represent larger areas, as lysimeters often isolate soil from external heat and water exchanges. This isolation may cause the lysimeter to overestimate evapotranspiration compared to surrounding fields.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪测量由于其单点特性，空间代表性有限。这可能导致在将数据外推以代表更大区域时出现差异，因为蒸渗仪通常将土壤与外部热量和水分交换隔离。这种隔离可能导致蒸渗仪对蒸散发的估计高于周围田地的实际情况。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the implications of seasonal crop growth on the representativeness of lysimeter data in agricultural research?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 季节性作物生长对农业研究中蒸发皿数据的代表性可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Seasonal crop growth can significantly influence lysimeter data, as the crop within the lysimeter may not exchange heat and water with its surroundings in the same way as the field crops. This can lead to higher soil temperatures and potentially higher evapotranspiration measurements within the lysimeter, affecting the representativeness of data for broader agricultural research.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 季节性作物生长可以显著影响蒸渗仪数据，因为蒸渗仪内的作物可能与周围环境的热量和水分交换方式与田间作物不同。这可能导致蒸渗仪内的土壤温度更高，并可能导致蒸散量测量更高，从而影响数据对更广泛农业研究的代表性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to analyze the correlation between meteorological factors and field evapotranspiration using lysimeter data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 分析气象因素与田间蒸散发之间的相关性，使用蒸渗仪数据是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Analyzing the correlation between meteorological factors and field evapotranspiration is important to understand how factors such as net radiation, air temperature, air humidity, and wind speed influence soil moisture and evapotranspiration rates. This understanding can improve irrigation decision-making and agricultural water management, providing insights into the environmental conditions that affect crop growth and water use efficiency.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 分析气象因素与田间蒸散的相关性对于理解净辐射、空气温度、空气湿度和风速等因素如何影响土壤湿度和蒸散速率至关重要。这种理解可以改善灌溉决策和农业水管理，为影响作物生长和水分利用效率的环境条件提供洞察。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the objective behind ensuring the consistency of growth conditions between crops inside lysimeters and the surrounding farmland?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 确保 lysimeters 内部作物与周围农田之间生长条件一致的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to ensure that the lysimeter observations accurately represent the evapotranspiration and growth conditions of the surrounding farmland. By maintaining consistent growth conditions, such as planting the same maize variety with identical planting times, spacing, and regular weeding, the study aims to minimize discrepancies between the lysimeter and the actual field conditions, thus enhancing the reliability and applicability of the data collected for agricultural research and water management.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是确保土壤水分观测准确反映周围农田的蒸散和生长条件。通过保持一致的生长条件，如种植相同的玉米品种、相同的播种时间、间距和定期除草，研究旨在最小化土壤水分观测与实际田间条件之间的差异，从而增强所收集数据在农业研究和水资源管理中的可靠性和适用性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in ensuring the accuracy and precision of evapotranspiration measurements using lysimeters in agricultural research?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保农业研究中使用蒸发蒸散仪测量的准确性和精确性涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In agricultural research, to ensure the accuracy and precision of evapotranspiration measurements using lysimeters, the setup involves installing lysimeters with a cylindrical structure and maintaining specific conditions such as bare soil and crop cover during growth seasons. Data quality control is implemented by ensuring the completeness of daily data records, removing anomalies caused by maintenance, and eliminating data that exceed physical meanings or instrument ranges.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在农业研究中，为确保使用蒸发蒸散仪测量的蒸发蒸散量的准确性和精确性，设置涉及安装具有圆柱结构的蒸发蒸散仪，并在生长季节保持特定条件，如裸土和作物覆盖。数据质量控制通过确保每日数据记录的完整性、去除因维护造成的异常以及消除超出物理意义或仪器范围的数据来实施。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key steps involved in setting up a multi-scale evapotranspiration observation system in a research area to study soil and crop water dynamics?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在研究区域内建立一个多尺度蒸散观测系统以研究土壤和作物水分动态的关键步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Setting up a multi-scale evapotranspiration observation system involves establishing a network of instruments including meteorological towers with automatic weather stations, eddy covariance systems, and lysimeters. These are strategically placed in irrigated and non-irrigated areas to capture diverse conditions. The lysimeters are configured to represent different surface conditions, such as bare soil and crop cover, to closely match the surrounding field conditions. Regular maintenance and alignment with local agricultural practices ensure consistency in data collection.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 建立一个多尺度蒸散发观测系统涉及建立一个仪器网络，包括带有自动气象站的气象塔、涡度协方差系统和土壤水分计。这些仪器被战略性地放置在灌溉和非灌溉区域，以捕捉不同的条件。土壤水分计的配置旨在代表不同的表面条件，如裸土和作物覆盖，以尽可能接近周围的田地条件。定期维护和与当地农业实践的一致性确保数据收集的稳定性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of different sensor systems enhance the accuracy of soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration data collection?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 不同传感器系统的集成如何提高土壤蒸发和作物蒸散数据收集的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of lysimeters with eddy covariance systems and automatic weather stations allows for comprehensive data collection, providing insight into soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration variations by correlating meteorological factors such as net radiation and soil moisture.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 将 lysimeter 与涡度协方差系统和自动气象站集成，可以进行全面的数据收集，通过关联气象因素如净辐射和土壤湿度，提供对土壤蒸发和作物蒸散变化的深入了解。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary to ensure the representativeness of lysimeter data in reflecting broader agricultural field conditions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 确保 lysimeter 数据能够反映更广泛农业田间条件所需的条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: It is crucial to maintain consistent growth conditions within the lysimeter and the surrounding fields, such as planting the same maize variety with identical sowing times, row, and plant spacing. Regular maintenance, like weeding, is also needed to ensure representativeness.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在 lysimeter 及周围田地内保持一致的生长条件至关重要，例如种植相同的玉米品种，采用相同的播种时间、行距和株距。定期维护，如除草，也很有必要，以确保代表性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a lysimeter's measurements of evapotranspiration differ from those of other methods such as eddy covariance?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么 lysimeter 的蒸散发测量结果可能与涡度协方差等其他方法的测量结果不同？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Lysimeter's measurements can be higher than those from eddy covariance because a lysimeter isolates the soil within it from the surrounding environment, affecting heat and water exchange. This isolation can lead to higher soil temperatures and potentially overestimated evapotranspiration values.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 蒸渗仪的测量值可能高于涡度协方差法的测量值，因为蒸渗仪将其内部的土壤与周围环境隔离，这影响了热量和水分的交换。这种隔离可能导致土壤温度升高，并可能高估蒸散发值。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges in ensuring that lysimeter-based data accurately represents regional evapotranspiration values?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 确保基于蒸渗仪的数据准确代表区域蒸散发值的预期挑战是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: A key challenge is the limited spatial representativeness of lysimeter data, as it is a point measurement. The isolation of the lysimeter from its surroundings can result in different water and heat exchange conditions compared to the broader region, potentially leading to discrepancies in evapotranspiration values.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 一个关键挑战是蒸渗仪数据的空间代表性有限，因为它是点测量。蒸渗仪与周围环境的隔离可能导致与更广泛区域的水分和热量交换条件不同，从而可能导致蒸散发值的差异。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using lysimeter data in representing broader regional agricultural evapotranspiration values, considering its spatial limitations?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用土壤水分测定器数据在代表更广泛区域农业蒸散发值方面的有效性，考虑到其空间限制？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The effectiveness of using lysimeter data is limited by its spatial representativeness, as it provides single-point observations. There is a need to verify whether lysimeter observations can represent field-scale evapotranspiration values. The data tends to overestimate evapotranspiration due to the lack of water and heat exchange between the inside of the lysimeter and surrounding field conditions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用蒸渗仪数据的有效性受到其空间代表性的限制，因为它提供的是单点观测。需要验证蒸渗仪观测是否能够代表田间尺度的蒸散发值。由于蒸渗仪内部与周围田间条件之间缺乏水分和热量交换，数据往往会高估蒸散发。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential challenges and limitations in ensuring consistent growth conditions between crops inside the lysimeter and those in the surrounding fields?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在确保 lysimeter 内作物与周围田地作物之间生长条件一致方面，可能面临哪些挑战和限制？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Ensuring consistent growth conditions involves challenges such as maintaining identical planting times, spacing, and regular maintenance like weeding. Differences in water and heat exchange between the lysimeter and surrounding fields may lead to discrepancies in growth conditions, potentially affecting the accuracy of evapotranspiration measurements.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 确保一致的生长条件面临着挑战，例如保持相同的种植时间、间距以及定期维护如除草。 lysimeter与周围田地之间的水分和热量交换差异可能导致生长条件的差异，从而可能影响蒸散发测量的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the data collection frequency and the processing protocol ensure the accuracy and reliability of the observed soil and meteorological parameters.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集频率和处理协议如何确保观察到的土壤和气象参数的准确性和可靠性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection frequency is set at one measurement per minute, with data being output every 10 minutes. This high frequency allows for detailed monitoring of changes in soil and meteorological parameters. The processing protocol includes ensuring the completeness of daily data (144 data points), marking missing data with -6999, and removing anomalies caused by maintenance or data points that exceed physical or instrumental ranges. This ensures that the data is accurate and reliable.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集频率设定为每分钟一次测量，每10分钟输出一次数据。这种高频率允许对土壤和气象参数变化进行详细监测。处理协议包括确保每日数据的完整性（144个数据点），用-6999标记缺失数据，并去除因维护或超出物理或仪器范围而导致的异常数据点。这确保了数据的准确性和可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the installation depth of various sensors within the lysimeter affects the overall data quality and representation of soil conditions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解各种传感器的安装深度如何影响数据质量和土壤条件的整体表现。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Sensors within the lysimeter are installed at various depths to capture a comprehensive profile of soil conditions. Soil temperature sensors are placed at depths of 5cm, 30cm, 50cm, 100cm, and 140cm, while soil moisture sensors are at 2cm, 10cm, 20cm, and 40cm depths. This ensures that variations in soil temperature and moisture at different levels are accurately captured, providing a detailed understanding of the soil profile, which is crucial for assessing evapotranspiration and other soil processes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: lysimeter 内的传感器安装在不同深度，以捕捉土壤条件的全面概况。土壤温度传感器安装在5厘米、30厘米、50厘米、100厘米和140厘米的深度，而土壤湿度传感器则安装在2厘米、10厘米、20厘米和40厘米的深度。这确保了在不同层次上土壤温度和湿度的变化能够被准确捕捉，从而提供对土壤剖面的详细理解，这对于评估蒸散发和其他土壤过程至关重要。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore and summarize the various data collection methods for measuring soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration in agricultural fields.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨并总结在农业领域测量土壤蒸发和作物蒸散的各种数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The field utilizes lysimeter measurements, eddy covariance (EC), and automatic weather stations (AWS) to analyze soil evaporation and crop evapotranspiration. The lysimeter is a key instrument for measuring evapotranspiration, particularly in maize fields, and it provides detailed insights into the relationship between evapotranspiration and meteorological factors such as net radiation and soil moisture. These methods help in understanding daily and seasonal variations in soil and crop water fluxes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该领域利用土壤水分测量仪、涡度协方差（EC）和自动气象站（AWS）来分析土壤蒸发和作物蒸散。土壤水分测量仪是测量蒸散的重要工具，特别是在玉米田中，它提供了蒸散与气象因素（如净辐射和土壤水分）之间关系的详细见解。这些方法有助于理解土壤和作物水分通量的日变化和季节变化。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss the challenges faced in ensuring the spatial representativeness of evaporation and evapotranspiration data collected in agricultural research.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 讨论在农业研究中确保蒸发和蒸散发数据的空间代表性所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Lysimeter data collection faces challenges in spatial representativeness due to its single-point observation nature, which limits its ability to represent regional farmland evapotranspiration accurately. The separation of the lysimeter from surrounding soil can lead to discrepancies in water and heat exchange, potentially causing an overestimation of evapotranspiration. This challenge necessitates validation against broader measures like the eddy covariance method to ensure regional applicability.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 土壤水分测定器数据收集面临空间代表性挑战，因为其单点观测的特性限制了其准确代表区域农田蒸散发的能力。土壤水分测定器与周围土壤的分离可能导致水分和热量交换的差异，从而可能导致蒸散发的高估。这一挑战需要通过与更广泛的测量方法（如涡度协方差法）进行验证，以确保区域适用性。
